title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Activity-Based Learning for Forensic Science and Toxicology Practical Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and foundational understanding of life sciences
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain forensic evidence collection procedures with 80% accuracy by analyzing real-world cases
Learners can correctly select three or more toxicological testing methods through addiction case simulations
Learners can draft forensic reports based on peer evaluation and feedback in online discussion forums

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
